settings.heading: Raymond Lee Jewelers﻿: Long-Trusted Diamond Buyers in Boca Raton

settings.text:
Since 1983, Raymond Lee Jewelers has been earning the trust of customers as premier diamond buyers in Boca Raton. Consistently recommended by clients, we are one of the most reputable diamond buyers in all of South Florida. We will buy your precious diamonds for the highest possible payout. And now, with a beautiful new state-of-the-art showroom in East Boca Raton, our newest store Diamonds by Raymond Lee provides our clientele another option. Stop by for a free appraisal at either of our convenient locations in Boca Raton.

Unlock tremendous cash value from your diamonds to meet your current financial needs. Selling diamonds is the ideal way to raise funds in a quick and simple way without taking out a loan or pawning your valuables. Are you wondering, “Where can I sell my diamond?” Are you hesitant to sell a large diamond because it’s not certified? Sell any size of diamond, certified or not, to Raymond Lee Jewelers or Diamonds by Raymond Lee for a debt-free way of getting cash to finance bills or a luxurious gift for someone special or yourself.

settings.heading: We Buy Diamonds – Any Type, Size and Shape!

settings.text: As one of the largest diamond buyers in Boca Raton, we buy all sizes and shapes of diamonds. We would be glad to offer a quote for your loose diamond stones of any cut, clarity or color. You can also sell us mounted diamonds, including unused and pre-owned diamond jewelry, antique and vintage diamond jewelry as well as designer diamond jewelry from brand names like Tiffany & Co., Cartier, Van Cleef & Arpels, etc. We buy all types of diamond jewelry including diamond engagement rings, bands, earrings, bracelets, necklaces, pendants and more.

Diamond Jewelry

Loose Diamonds

Any Carat Size: 1 carat, 2 carat, 3 carat, 4 carat, and up

Any Shape: Round, Radiant, Princess, Asscher, Oval, Emerald, Marquise, Heart, Pear, etc.

Any Cut from Poor to Excellent

Any Color from Light to Colorless (Z to D on the GIA color scale)

Lab Certified Diamonds: GIA, IGI, EGL and others.

Non-Certified Diamonds
Stop by our beautiful Boca Raton showrooms today for a free, no-obligation quote!

settings.heading: Sell Diamond Rings and Engagement Rings

settings.text: Raymond Lee Jewelers and Diamonds by Raymond Lee are the places to sell your diamond ring. We are experts in buying pre-owned diamond rings, including diamond engagement rings, wedding ring or eternity rings whether in a solitaire or multi-stone setting. We understand that after a breakup or a divorce there may be a lot of emotions involved in selling a diamond engagement ring or wedding ring. We offer a professional and simple diamond-buying process that makes it easy for you to sell your engagement ring or wedding ring in the most confidential and stress-free manner. Get the best price on your diamond rings by selling to an established and reputable diamond buyer.

settings.heading: What Do We Look At When Buying Diamonds?

settings.text: As a diamond owner, you know what the 4Cs are: Color, Clarity, Cut and Carat weight. You took these factors into account when you bought your diamond. These are the same factors that we would pay attention to when buying your diamond piece. Color actually refers to how white or colorless the diamond is. Clarity refers to the flawlessness inside a diamond. Cut, together with proportion, determines the brilliance or dullness of a diamond. Carat weight refers to the size of the diamond. All of these factors would affect the value of your diamond. We would also look at the metal used for the diamond setting and the current market conditions at the time of appraisal.

Raymond Lee Jewelers has highly-qualified and experienced in-house gemologists to help with the appraisal of your diamond. Our diamond buying team will carefully determine the exact qualities of your piece, taking into account every aspect from cut to carat weight. We utilize state-of-the-art equipment and tools to evaluate a diamond’s true value. We’re confident about our knowledge and skills in diamond valuation and we will always offer hard-to-beat prices. When we appraise your diamond, our objective is to pay you the best possible price for your diamond than any other diamond buyers in Boca Raton and the South Florida area.

settings.title: Honest and No-Pressure Appraisal
settings.content: Raymond Lee Jewelers has highly-qualified and experienced in-house gemologists to help with the appraisal of your diamond. Our diamond buying team will carefully determine the exact qualities of your piece, taking into account every aspect from cut to carat weight. We utilize state-of-the-art equipment and tools to evaluate a diamond’s true value. We’re confident about our knowledge and skills in diamond valuation and we will always offer hard-to-beat prices. When we appraise your diamond, our objective is to pay you the best possible price for your diamond than any other diamond buyers in Boca Raton and the South Florida area.

settings.title: Private and Secure Locations
settings.content: Raymond Lee Jewelers and Diamonds by Raymond Lee respect customers’ privacy. Regardless of your reason for wanting to sell your diamonds, we will provide the highest level of customer service with complete professionalism, courtesy and confidentiality to make your experience with us enjoyable and worth recommending to others. We have 24/7 camera surveillance monitoring, highly secure vaults, and both stores are secured by armed guards during business hours. Whether you walk into our store with or without an appointment, you can expect your personal information and entire transaction to be handled with the utmost confidentiality.

settings.title: Buying Diamonds at the Best Price
settings.content: Raymond Lee Jewelers and Diamonds by Raymond Lee are the best places to sell diamonds in Boca Raton. We make cash offers for diamonds at the best price possible. When you accept our offer, you will receive payment in cash on the spot. As a leading diamond buyer, you will find our offer is typically higher than if you sell your diamond to a pawnshop or an average jewelry store in the area. Integrity and security are at the heart of our business so you can be confident about our offer and our 40-year operations. If you’re looking for the most return for your diamond and an honest transaction from experienced diamond buyers, we will be glad to serve you!
